com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull

    public final class BleServer
extends BleNode
    Get an instance from BleManager.getServer(). Wrapper for functionality exposed by BluetoothGattServer. For OS levels less than 5.0, this is only useful by piggybacking on an existing BleDevice that is currently BleDeviceState.CONNECTED. For OS levels 5.0 and up a BleServer is capable of acting as an independent peripheral.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BleServer.AdvertisingListener
      Provide an implementation to setListener_Advertising(BleServer.AdvertisingListener), and BleManager.setListener_Advertising(BleServer.AdvertisingListener) to receive a callback when using startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket).
      static interface  BleServer.ConnectionFailListener
      Provide an implementation of this callback to setListener_ConnectionFail(ConnectionFailListener).
      static class  BleServer.DefaultConnectionFailListener
      Default implementation of BleServer.ConnectionFailListener that attempts a certain number of retries.
      static interface  BleServer.ExchangeListener
      Tagging interface, not to be implemented directly as this is just the base interface to statically tie together BleServer.IncomingListener and BleServer.OutgoingListener with common enums/structures.
      static interface  BleServer.IncomingListener
      Provide an instance through setListener_Incoming(IncomingListener).
      static interface  BleServer.OutgoingListener
      Provide an instance to various static methods of BleServer.IncomingListener.Please such as BleServer.IncomingListener.Please.respondWithSuccess(BleServer.OutgoingListener), or setListener_Outgoing(OutgoingListener), or BleManager.setListener_Outgoing(BleServer.OutgoingListener).
      static interface  BleServer.ServiceAddListener
      Provide an implementation of this callback to setListener_ServiceAdd(ServiceAddListener).
      static interface  BleServer.StateListener
      Provide an implementation to setListener_State(StateListener) and/or BleManager.setListener_ServerState(BleServer.StateListener) to receive state change events.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleNode

        BleNode.HistoricalDataLoadListener, BleNode.HistoricalDataQueryListener

      • sendNotification

        public final BleServer.OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent sendNotification(java.lang.String macAddress,
                                                                       java.util.UUID serviceUuid,
                                                                       java.util.UUID charUuid,
                                                                       FutureData futureData)
        Overload of sendNotification(String, UUID, UUID, FutureData, OutgoingListener).

      • sendNotification

        public final BleServer.OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent sendNotification(java.lang.String macAddress,
                                                                       java.util.UUID serviceUuid,
                                                                       java.util.UUID charUuid,
                                                                       FutureData futureData,
                                                                       BleServer.OutgoingListener listener)
        Use this method to send a notification to the client device with the given mac address to the given characteristic UUID. If there is any kind of "early-out" issue then this method will return a BleServer.OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent in addition to passing it through the listener. Otherwise this method will return an instance with BleServer.OutgoingListener.OutgoingEvent.isNull() being true.

      • isAdvertisingSupportedByAndroidVersion

        public final boolean isAdvertisingSupportedByAndroidVersion()
        Checks to see if the device is running an Android OS which supports advertising. This is forwarded from BleManager.isAdvertisingSupportedByAndroidVersion().

      • startAdvertising

        public final BleServer.AdvertisingListener.AdvertisingEvent startAdvertising(java.util.UUID[] serviceUuids,
                                                                             BleAdvertisingSettings settings,
                                                                             BleServer.AdvertisingListener listener)
        Overload of startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket, BleAdvertisingSettings, AdvertisingListener).

      • startAdvertising

        public final BleServer.AdvertisingListener.AdvertisingEvent startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket advPacket)
        Overload of startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket, BleAdvertisingSettings, AdvertisingListener). This sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO, and BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower.MEDIUM, and no timeout for the advertisement.

      • startAdvertising

        public final BleServer.AdvertisingListener.AdvertisingEvent startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket advPacket,
                                                                             BleServer.AdvertisingListener listener)
        Overload of startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket, BleAdvertisingSettings, AdvertisingListener). This sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO, and BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower.MEDIUM, and no timeout for the advertisement.

      • startAdvertising

        public final BleServer.AdvertisingListener.AdvertisingEvent startAdvertising(BleAdvertisingPacket advertisePacket,
                                                                             BleAdvertisingSettings settings,
                                                                             BleServer.AdvertisingListener listener)
        Starts advertising serviceUuids with the information supplied in BleAdvertisingPacket. Note that this will only work for devices on Lollipop, or above. Even then, not every device supports advertising. Use BleManager.isAdvertisingSupported() to check to see if the phone supports it.

      • stopAdvertising

        public final void stopAdvertising()
        Stops the server from advertising.

      • getName

        public final java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name this BleServer is using (and will be advertised as, if applicable).

      • setName

        public final void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name you wish this BleServer to be known as. This will affect how other devices see this server, and sets the name on the lower level BluetoothAdapter. If you DO change this, please be aware this will affect everything, including apps outside of your own. It's probably best NOT to use this, but it's here for flexibility.

      • getNative

        public final android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattServer getNative()
        Provides just-in-case lower-level access to the native server instance. See similar warning for BleDevice.getNative().

      • getNativeLayer

        public final P_NativeServerLayer getNativeLayer()
        Provides just-in-case access to the abstracted server instance. See similar warning for BleDevice.getNative().

      • getStateMask

        public final int getStateMask(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Returns the bitwise state mask representation of BleServerState for the given client mac address.
        See Also:
        BleServerState

      • isAny

        public final boolean isAny(java.lang.String macAddress,
                           int mask_BleServerState)
        Returns true if there is any bitwise overlap between the provided value and getStateMask(String).
        See Also:
        isAll(String, int)

      • isAll

        public final boolean isAll(java.lang.String macAddress,
                           int mask_BleServerState)
        Returns true if there is complete bitwise overlap between the provided value and getStateMask(String).
        See Also:
        isAny(String, int)

      • disconnect

        public final boolean disconnect(java.lang.String macAddress)

      • disconnect

        public final void disconnect()
        Disconnects this server completely, disconnecting all connected clients and shutting things down. To disconnect individual clients use disconnect(String).

      • isNull

        Description copied from interface: UsesCustomNull
        Returns true if the object's state represents what would otherwise be Java's built-in null.

      • addService

        public final BleServer.ServiceAddListener.ServiceAddEvent addService(BleService service)
        Overload of addService(BleService, ServiceAddListener) without the listener.

      • addService

        public final BleServer.ServiceAddListener.ServiceAddEvent addService(BleService service,
                                                                     BleServer.ServiceAddListener listener)
        Starts the process of adding a service to this server. The provided listener will be called when the service is added or there is a problem.

      • removeService

        public final android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattService removeService(java.util.UUID serviceUuid)
        Remove any service previously provided to addService(BleService, ServiceAddListener) or overloads. This can be safely called even if the call to addService(BleService, ServiceAddListener) hasn't resulted in a callback to the provided listener yet, in which case it will be called with BleServer.ServiceAddListener.Status.CANCELLED_FROM_REMOVAL.

      • removeAllServices

        public final void removeAllServices()
        Convenience to remove all services previously added with addService(BleService, ServiceAddListener) (or overloads). This is slightly more performant too.

      • getClients

        public final void getClients(ForEach_Void<java.lang.String> forEach)
        Offers a more "functional" means of iterating through the internal list of clients instead of using getClients() or getClients_List().

      • getClients

        public final void getClients(ForEach_Void<java.lang.String> forEach,
                             BleServerState state)
        Same as getClients(ForEach_Void) but will only return clients in the given state provided.

      • getClients

        public final void getClients(ForEach_Void<java.lang.String> forEach,
                             BleServerState... states)
        Same as getClients(ForEach_Void) but will only return clients in any of the given states provided.

      • getClients

        public final void getClients(ForEach_Breakable<java.lang.String> forEach)
        Overload of getClients(ForEach_Void) if you need to break out of the iteration at any point.
